dict.string: Mello needs camera access to capture your diving adventures and generate stunning underwater-themed images with AI technology.
Mello uses local network access to connect with diving equipment, underwater cameras, and share content with nearby dive buddies.
Mello uses location services to track dive sites, provide marine conservation updates, and enhance your underwater exploration experience.
Mello uses your location to find nearby dive sites, log dive locations, and provide location-based marine life information.
Mello uses microphone access to record audio for your diving logs and underwater adventure videos.
Mello saves your AI-generated underwater images and diving photos to your photo library for easy sharing and memories.
Mello needs access to your photo library to save generated ocean images, share diving memories, and import photos for AI enhancement.
Mello uses tracking to deliver personalized ocean content, suggest relevant dive sites, and provide tailored marine life experiences. Your privacy is important to us.
